title: Critical Madden Theory
description: The fellas slam the CDC's Calvinball nonsense, provide a squirrel terrorism update, and dunk on a professor's bad John Madden tweets before playing King of the Hill.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Josh Holmes, Comfortably Smug, Michael Duncan)
